full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DBYANGS CAN DGYES GLU'I DKA' 'GREL NGO MTSAR 'JUG SGO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @066A *, ,CES DBYANGS CAN DGYES GLU'I DKA' 'GREL NGO MTSAR 'JUG SGO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DBYANGS CAN BZHAD PA'I BLO LDAN NAM MING GZHAN DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,` AOm SVA STI, SNYAN NGAG DBYANGS CAN DGYES GLU YI, ,RTOGS PAR DKA' BA'I GNAS RNAMS KUN, ,GSAL BYED NGO MTSAR 'JUG SGO YI, ,PAR BSKRUN RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,'DI YI YIG MKHAN HO BA DANG, ,SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYIS GTZO BYAS PA'I, ,MAR GYUR MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA KUN, ,SDUG BSNGAL RGYUN CHAD SANGS RGYAS SHOG ,BDAG GZHAN DUS GSUM DGE TSOGS NYI SHAR DANG, ,LHAN CIG DGE 'DI'I 'OD STONG 'PHROS PA'I MTHUS, ,'GAL RKYEN SMAG RUM SEL DANG CHABS CIG TU, ,BLA MA'I MDZAD 'PHRIN PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI NI DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BSTAN SPEL GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN BZHAD PA'I BLO GSAL,
